content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_custom_heading text=”ADR Chambers’ premises offer a comfortable, convenient, accessible and equipped space.” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:28px|text_align:left|line_height:36px” google_fonts=”font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1532979981057{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]ADR Chambers’ facilities in North York at 180 Duncan Mill Road have been designed for mediations and arbitrations, with spacious main rooms and multiple breakout rooms. ADR Chambers’ office is fully accessible.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]ADR Chambers facilities include:

  • Private Caucus/Breakout Rooms
  • Catering (available on request)
  • Complimentary coffee, tea and snacks
  • A/V Equipment

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1498578991881{padding-top: 20px !important;}”]

  • Wi-fi
  • Computer workstations
  • Copying and printing
  • Faxing

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

North York Location
(near the 401 and Don Valley Parkway)

180 Duncan Mill Road, 4th Floor
North York, Ontario, M3B 1Z6

Tel: 416-362-8555
Toll-free: 1-800-856-5154

Fax: 416-362-8825
Toll-free (fax): 1-877-862-8825

Email: adr@adrchambers.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

Parking

Parking is available at:

  • 220 Duncan Mill Road (from 7:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.) for $12* per day: and
  • 240 Duncan Mill Road (from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.) for $ 6* per day.

*Please note that prices are subject to change without notice.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_gmaps link=”#E-8_” size=”350″][vc_images_carousel images=”1297,1298,1299,1300,1302,1304,1305,1306,1307,1308″ img_size=”500×300″ autoplay=”yes” wrap=”yes”][vc_column_text]

Arbitration Place

Bay Adelaide Centre
900-333 Bay Street
Toronto, M5H 2T4

Arbitration Place offers state-of-the-art hearing facilities with concierge-level administrative support.

Arbitration Place is affiliated with ASAP Reporting Services, a leading court reporting service that’s located on-site. ASAP offers court reporting and videography services at Arbitration Place and elsewhere. Its personnel have the highest certification standard and are experienced with arbitrations.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”hidden-print”][vc_custom_heading text=”Company” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”menu-header”][vc_wp_custommenu nav_menu=”54″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
